document_data.caption: The region around Telstang Brook, ''circa'' [[1480 DR]]
document_data.name: Telstang Brook
document_data.mainbody: '''Telstang Brook''' was a long stream located in the western region of [[the Ride]] on the [[Moonsea North]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|81}}{{Cite dungeon/170/Monument of the Ancients|56}}
document_data.Geography:
The stream flowed northwest from the [[West Galena Mountains]], west through [[Vercy Wood]], before joining with [[Razack's Tears]] and emptying into [[Lake Longreach]].

Telstang Brook crossed both the [[Ilinvur Trail]], and the [[Way of the Powrie]] just outside the settlement of [[Ilinvur]].
